sentences.sContent: He spent two nights under close observation in hospital.
sentences.sCn: 他在医院接受了两个晚上的严密观察。

sentences.sContent: His orders were to keep the men under observation.
sentences.sCn: 他下的命令是监视这些人。

sentences.sContent: Art classes help develop children’s powers of observation.
sentences.sCn: 美术课有助于提高儿童的观察力。

sentences.sContent: Careful observation suggests that this is not the case.
sentences.sCn: 仔细观察的结果表明情况并非如此。

sentences.sContent: Detailed observations were carried out on the behaviour of the students.
sentences.sCn: 对这些学生的行为作了细致观察。

sentences.sContent: From their direct observations, children absorb a model of marriage.
sentences.sCn: 儿童通过直接观察来理解某一种婚姻的模式。
